original_text: For the desires of the flesh are against the Spirit, and the desires of the Spirit are against the flesh, for these are opposed to each other, to keep you from doing the things you want to do.
korean_text: 육체의 소욕은 성령을 거스르고 성령은 육체를 거스르나니 이 둘이 서로 대적함으로 너희가 원하는 것을 하지 못하게 하려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: For the desires of the flesh are against the Spirit
and the desires of the Spirit are against the flesh
for these are opposed to each other
to keep you from doing the things you want to do.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 하고자 하는 것들을 하지 못하게 하려 함이라.
